Sentencas: Mathematical models of an indirect internal reforming solid oxide fuel cell (IIR-SOFC) fed by four different primary fuels, i.e., methane, biogas, methanol and ethanol, are developed based on steady-state, heterogeneous, two-dimensional and tubular-design SOFC models.
Titulo: Modelling of tubular-designed solid oxide fuel cell with indirect internal reforming operation fed by different primary fuels

Sentencas: The effect of fuel type on the thermal coupling between internal endothermic reforming with exothermic electrochemical reactions and system performance are determined.
Titulo: Modelling of tubular-designed solid oxide fuel cell with indirect internal reforming operation fed by different primary fuels

Sentencas: The simulation reveals that an IIR-SOFC fuelled by methanol provides the smoothest temperature gradient with high electrochemical efficiency.
Titulo: Modelling of tubular-designed solid oxide fuel cell with indirect internal reforming operation fed by different primary fuels

Sentencas: Furthermore, the content of CO2 in biogas plays an important role on system performance since electrical efficiency is improved by the removal of some CO2 from biogas but a larger temperature gradient is expected.
Titulo: Modelling of tubular-designed solid oxide fuel cell with indirect internal reforming operation fed by different primary fuels

Sentencas: Sensitivity analysis of three parameters, namely, a operating pressure, inlet steam to carbon (S:C) ratio and flow direction is then performed.
Titulo: Modelling of tubular-designed solid oxide fuel cell with indirect internal reforming operation fed by different primary fuels

Sentencas: By increasing the operating pressure up to 10 bar, the system efficiency increases and the temperature gradient can be minimized.
Titulo: Modelling of tubular-designed solid oxide fuel cell with indirect internal reforming operation fed by different primary fuels

Sentencas: The use of a high inlet S: C ratio reduces the cooling spot at the entrance of reformer channel but the electrical efficiency is considerably decreased.
Titulo: Modelling of tubular-designed solid oxide fuel cell with indirect internal reforming operation fed by different primary fuels

Sentencas: An IIR-SOFC with a counter-flow pattern (as based case) is compared with that with co-flow pattern (co-flow of air and fuel streams through fuel cell).
Titulo: Modelling of tubular-designed solid oxide fuel cell with indirect internal reforming operation fed by different primary fuels

Sentencas: The IIR-SOFC with co-flow pattern provides higher voltage and a smoother temperature gradient along the system due to superior matching between heat supplied from electrochemical reaction and heat required for steam reforming reaction; thus it is expected to be a better option for practical applications.
Titulo: Modelling of tubular-designed solid oxide fuel cell with indirect internal reforming operation fed by different primary fuels
